paragraphs.text:
%spark

import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils
import java.net.URL
import java.nio.charset.Charset
 
val cveApi = sc.parallelize(IOUtils.toString(new URL("https://api-us-west-2.srcclr.com/catalog/search?q=language%3Ajava%20type%3Avulnerability"), Charset.forName("utf8")).split("\n"))

val cveApiJson = sqlContext.read.json(cveApi).toDF()

msg.data:
import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils
import java.net.URL
import java.nio.charset.Charset
cveApi: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = ParallelCollectionRDD[0] at parallelize at <console>:31
cveApiJson: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [contents: array<struct<_enhanced:bigint,_severity:double,_vulnCount:bigint,_vulnerableMethods:boolean,hitScore:double,model:struct<artifactComponents:array<struct<componentId:bigint,componentLatestRelease:string,coordHash:string,coordOne:string,coordTwo:string,versionRanges:array<struct<commitHashes:array<string>,componentInstances:array<struct<componentInstanceHash:string,componentInstanceId:bigint>>,endCommit:string,fixDate:string,fixLinks:array<struct<description:string,link:string,type:string>>,fixText:string,id:bigint,patch:string,startCommit:string,updateToVersion:string,versionRange:string>>>>,artifactLinks:array<string>,community:boolean,createdDate:string,cveDigits:string,cveStatus:string,cveYear:string,disclosureDate:string,hasExpl...

paragraphs.text:
%spark


val contents = cveApiJson.select(explode($"contents").as("contents"))


val result = contents.select($"contents.model.id", $"contents._severity", $"contents.model.title",$"contents.model.cveYear", $"contents.model.cveDigits", $"artifact.coordTwo",$"artifact.versionRanges.updateToVersion", $"artifact.versionRanges.versionRange",explode($"contents.model.artifactComponents").as("artifact"))


result.registerTempTable("cveTable")

msg.data:
contents: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [contents: struct<_enhanced: bigint, _severity: double ... 5 more fields>]
result: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, _severity: double ... 7 more fields]
warning: there was one deprecation warning; re-run with -deprecation for details

paragraphs.text:
%sql

SELECT id, _severity, title, CONCAT("CVE","-",cveYear,"-",cveDigits), coordTwo, versionRange, updateToVersion FROM cveTable
